name: Snailblazer
description:
Play as Jim the Snail on his harrowing journey to prove that snails can find a better way through the power of legs. Experience the elite 2D platforming made possible only by this game-changing discovery. Will Jim prove his worth? Will legs be accepted by the snails? Is this all even anatomically possible? Only you can find out!

This game was made as a final project for an introductory game design course. It was made in around 2 and a half weeks.
